abstract: Israeli Supreme Court overturns main charge in bribery conviction of former Prime Min Ehud Olmert, cutting his six-year prison sentence to 18 months.
lead_paragraph: The former prime minister of Israel was convicted in 2014 of taking bribes, in part to facilitate the construction of a housing complex while he was mayor of Jerusalem.

headline.main: Ehud Olmert’s Sentence in Bribery Case Is Cut to 18 Months
headline.print_headline: Israeli Court Cuts Sentence of Ex-Premier

snippet: The former prime minister of Israel was convicted in 2014 of taking bribes, in part to facilitate the construction of a housing complex while he was mayor of Jerusalem.
